Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/trisk.jpg
a hazardous underground dig site

The ground levels out slightly to the left of the path, the earth overturned in large piles of loose soil. Abandoned digging tools scatter the area in a chaotic fashion beneath a partially collapsed scaffold used to support the crumbling ceiling. The path winds upward between some boulders and narrows into a crevice leading downward.

The ground levels out slightly to the left of the path, the earth overturned in large piles of loose soil. Abandoned digging tools scatter the area in a chaotic fashion beneath a partially collapsed scaffold used to support the crumbling ceiling. The slick ground is covered in unusual markings surrounding the dig site and a number of shattered, empty crates are broken along the area where the walls meet the ground. Hanging oil lanterns are knocked askew, those that aren't overturned appear to have burned out long ago. The path winds upward between some boulders and narrows into a crevice leading downward.
http://i.imgur.com/whiVNPF.png
a narrow crevice through the rocks
A narrow crevice winds through the rocks, steeply sloping downward.
a path meandering upward through the boulders
A path meanders upward through the scattered boulders higher on the slope.
$(this.trait:boulder) boulder
A $(this.trait:boulder) boulder lies nearby.
the multiple boulders strewn around the area
Many boulders of varying sizes are strewn about the area in chaotic formation.
the rocky ceiling overhead
The ceiling overhead.
The ceiling overhead is rocky and moist, drops of water occasionally falling down from above.
the chill that permeates the air
The air is still and unmoving, but the chill that permeates it is damp and cold.
the northeast corner
The northeast corner of the room.
The northeast corner of the room.
the northwest corner
The northwest corner of the room.
The northwest corner of the room.
the southeast corner
The southeast corner of the room.
The southeast corner of the room.
the southwest corner
The southwest corner of the room.
The southwest corner of the room.
the corners
The corners of the room.
The corners of the room.
a collection of broken crates littering the perimeter of the area
A collection of broken crates litter the perimeter of the area, appearing to have been smashed open against the walls.
the dampness
The air is damp, water dripping from every surface and making the ground slick.
the darkness surrounding you
Darkness threatens from all sides, lingering on the outskirts of the dim aura of the lights.
a level patch of overturned ground
The ground levels out to the left of the path, the soil overturned and piled high around the dig site.
the droplets of water continually falling from the ceiling

Droplets of water hang pregnant and large from the ceiling overhead before gravity takes over and sends it falling to the ground below, occasionally atop the heads of those daring to traverse the caves.
the echo
Sounds echo through the caves, reverberating off the stone walls and confusing your senses.
the loose pebbles covering the path
Loose pebbles covering the path makes the travel difficult and treacherous.
the craggy ground
The ground surrounding the path is craggy and covered in boulders of every size.
a series of burnt out or toppled oil lanterns
Oil lamps surrounding the dig site have either long-since been burned dry or are knocked asunder in a chaotic fashion.
a series of strange markings scratched into the stone
A series of strange markings are scratched into the surface of a large boulder. It is hard to decipher if they are glyphs or letters.
the middle of the room
The middle of the room.
The middle of the room.
the treacherously slick and rocky path
A path winds through the caves, treacherously slick and strewn with ( gravel \| stones \| pebbles ).
a rusted pick-ax
A small, rusty pick-ax is lying haphazardly near the piles of loose dirt.
the partially collapsed scaffolding over the dig site
The dig site is arranged beneath a supportive scaffold that appears to be partially collapsed.
the dancing shadows all around
Shadows dance eerily up and down the walls, moving in sporadic patterns in the dim light.
a bent hand shovel
A small hand shovel made of iron. The shovel is bent nearly in half where it lies off to the side of the dig site.
a wire sieve
A hand-held wire sieve is stuck halfway in the dirt, bent slightly out of round.
the piles of loose soil surrounding the dig site
Large piles of loose soil surround the dig site to the left of the path.
the eerie sounds filling the area
You cannot see the sounds or that which causes them, but all around you, various undefinable noises permeate the caves, echoing off the walls with chaotic cacophony.
a dark stain near the path
A large, dark stain marks the ground near the path. It is ruddy and dark brown in the shape of a pool of liquid.
a multitude of miscellaneous tools scattered nearby
A multitude of miscellaneous tools scatter the area surrounding the dig site.
a broken trowel
A small trowel stuck in the soil, the handle appears to have been broken off.
the eastern wall
The eastern wall.
The eastern wall.
the northern wall
The northern wall.
The northern wall.
the southern wall
The southern wall.
The southern wall.
the western wall
The western wall.
The western wall.
the walls
There are walls surrounding the room.
There are walls surrounding the room.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ Droplets of water fall regularly from the ceiling overhead, the soft plop echoing hollowly through the space. \| A small shuffling sound can be heard in the distance, but the acoustics confuse your sense of where the sound came from. \| The air is still and cold, the damp chill permeating the area. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| A slight breeze manages to enter through the entrance, but the winding stone walls quickly subdue it. \| A scurrying sound comes from somewhere nearby, but the shadows are too dark to discern what it may be. \| The shadows shift fluidly over the walls in the dim light, dancing in an eerie fashion. \| In the distance you hear the ping-ping-ping of water dripping in the dark. \| A distant shifting of a small stone indicates that you are not alone in this cave. \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;

X[S] \{ Droplets of water fall regularly from the ceiling overhead, the soft plop echoing hollowly through the space. \| A small shuffling sound can be heard in the distance, but the acoustics confuse your sense of where the sound came from. \| The air is still and cold, the damp chill permeating the area. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| A slight breeze manages to enter through the entrance, but the winding stone walls quickly subdue it. \| A scurrying sound comes from somewhere nearby, but the shadows are too dark to discern what it may be. \| The shadows shift fluidly over the walls in the dim light, dancing in an eerie fashion. \| In the distance you hear the ping-ping-ping of water dripping in the dark. \| A distant shifting of a small stone indicates that you are not alone in this cave. \}
